mapper.select: SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg, c.cateCode, c.cateName, c.cateCodeRef FROM goods g INNER JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsStock, g.gdsDes, g.gdsImg, g.gdsDate, g.gdsThumbImg, c.cateCode, c.cateName from goods g JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into review(gdsNum, userId, reviewNum, reviewContent) values(#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, #{reviewNum}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: select r.gdsNum, r.userId, r.reviewNum, r.reviewContent, r.reviewDate, m.userId, m.userName from review r join member m on r.userId = m.userId where gdsNum = #{gdsNum} order by reviewNum asc
select userId from review where reviewNum = #{reviewNum}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartNum, cartStock, gdsNum, userId) values(#{cartNum}, #{cartStock}, #{gdsNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNum, c.cartStock, c.gdsNum, c.userId, c.addDate, g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice FROM cart c JOIN goods g ON c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum WHERE c.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY c.cartNum desc
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cartNum = #{cartNum} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into `order`(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhone, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhone}, #{amount})
insert into orderdetail(orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from cart
